oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Check for St. Jude
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hospitals; medicine; portraits; Roland, Charlie B.; Toler, Al; Watkins, Ethel;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: From left to right: Mrs. Ethel Watkins, Mr. Al Toler and Mrs. Charlie B. Roland. They are holding a check in front of St. Jude Children's Research Hospital. The photo is marked for publication.
